articles.title: Lucy Letby: killer nurse jailed for rest of her life by UK court - Reuters UK
articles.description: Nurse Lucy Letby will spend the rest of her life behind bars for killing seven newborn babies after a judge on Monday ruled Britain's most prolific serial child killer of modern times should never be released.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 21 (Reuters) - Nurse Lucy Letby will spend the rest of her life behind bars for killing seven newborn babies after a judge on Monday ruled Britain's most prolific serial child killer of m… [+3814 chars]

articles.title: Webb captures detailed beauty of Ring Nebula - European Space Agency
articles.description: The NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope has observed the well-known Ring Nebula with unprecedented detail. Formed by a star throwing off its outer layers as it runs out of fuel, the Ring Nebula is an archetypal planetary nebula. The object is al…

articles.title: Ozempic, the 'miracle drug,' and the harmful idea of a future without fat - The Conversation
articles.description: The messaging around Ozempic being a miracle cure is not only a lie, it has kicked up a new level of fatphobia.
articles.content:
The headlines squeal with delight: Latest wonder drug will cure obesity.
